I'm currently enjoying life in Shanghai, China. Originally I am from the suburbs of Saint-Petersburg, Russia. As I am not a native English-speaker, this blog is also a way for me to improve my English skills. So, if you find some grammar mistakes or inaccuracies, you are more than welcome to tell me. Please leave comments.
